price: Uzanabona imisozi wibwire ko iri hamwe, nyamara izaba igenda yihuta nk’ibicu.[1] Ibyo ni ibikorwa na Allah, We watunganyije buri kintu. Mu by’ukuri We azi byimazeyo ibyo mukora.
arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلۡجِبَالَ تَحۡسَبُهَا جَامِدَةٗ وَهِيَ تَمُرُّ مَرَّ ٱلسَّحَابِۚ صُنۡعَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَتۡقَنَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍۚ إِنَّهُۥ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَفۡعَلُونَ
footnotes: [1] Abahanga mu bumenyi bw’isi baje kumenya ko imigabane igize isi igenda yimuka gake gake yegerana cyangwa itatana mu gihe kirekire cyane. Ibi bikaba bishimangira ukuri kw’uyu murongo wa Qur’ani.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: watarā al-jibāla taḥsabuhā jāmidatan wahiya tamurru marra al-saḥābi ṣun'ʿa al-lahi alladhī atqana kulla shayin innahu khabīrun bimā tafʿalūna
